name: Path T
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Use code 360 for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.  Use higher codes for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.

**Note 2:**  Use code 300 for localized tumor only if no information is available to assign code 105 or 360.
rows:
In situ, intraepithelial, noninvasive
- - - - - - - - - -
Tumor confined to mucosa of one of the following:
    Frontal sinus
    Sphenoid sinus
- - - - - - - - - -
Localized, NOS
- - - - - - - - - -
Tumor confined to mucosa of more than one accessory sinus
- - - - - - - - - -
Tumor confined to mucosa of adjacent structure:
    Nasal cavity:
        Floor
        Lateral wall
        Septum
        Turbinates
    Nasal cavity, NOS    
    Nasopharynx
- - - - - - - - - -
Involvement of deep soft tissues of single accessory sinus
- - - - - - - - - -
360 +330

Involvement of deep soft tissues of single accessory sinus plus mucosal involvement of any structure in code 330
- - - - - - - - - -
Involvement of deep soft tissues of more than one accessory sinus
- - - - - - - - - -
Involvement of deep soft tissues of adjacent structures in code 330
- - - - - - - - - -
Destruction of bony wall of sinus
- - - - - - - - - -
Involvement of hard palate
- - - - - - - - - -
Bone, cartilage:
    Facial bones

    Orbital structures
    Pterygoid fossa
    Zygoma
- - - - - - - - - -

Skin of nose
Skin of cheek
Muscles:

    Pterygoid

Anterior cranial fossa
Base of skull
Clivus
Cribriform plate
Middle cranial fossa
